'''How to Train Your Dragon Add-On''' is an [[add-on]] made to promote the [[Wikipedia:How to Train Your Dragon (2025 film)|live action film of the same name]], released by [[Universal Studios]].

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
* [[File:HTTYD Intro Book.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] The HTTYD Rider's Guide
** Used to guide the player through the add-on.
* [[File:HTTYD Dragon saddle.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Dragon Saddle
** Used like a normal [[saddle]], but on a dragon.
* [[File:HTTYD Dragon horn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Dragon Horn
** Used to summon dragons.
* [[File:HTTYD Dragon book.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Dragon Book
'''Armor'''
* {{Animate|HTTYD Deadly Armor Helmet.png;HTTYD Deadly Armor Chestplate.png;HTTYD Deadly Armor Leggings.png;HTTYD Deadly Armor Boots.png|32px|class=pixel-image}} Deadly Nadder Rider Armor
* {{Animate|HTTYD Gronckle Armor Helmet.png;HTTYD Gronckle Armor Chestplate.png;HTTYD Gronckle Armor Leggings.png;HTTYD Gronckle Armor Boots.png|32px|class=pixel-image}} Gronckle Rider Armor
* {{Animate|HTTYD Hideous Armor Helmet.png;HTTYD Hideous Armor Chestplate.png;HTTYD Hideous Armor Leggings.png;HTTYD Hideous Armor Boots.png|32px|class=pixel-image}} Hideous Zippleback Rider Armor
* {{Animate|HTTYD Monstrous Armor Helmet.png;HTTYD Monstrous Armor Chestplate.png;HTTYD Monstrous Armor Leggings.png;HTTYD Monstrous Armor Boots.png|32px|class=pixel-image}} Monstrous Nightmare Rider Armor
* {{Animate|HTTYD Night Armor Helmet.png;HTTYD Night Armor Chestplate.png;HTTYD Night Armor Leggings.png;HTTYD Night Armor Boots.png|32px|class=pixel-image}} Toothless Rider Armor
* [[File:HTTYD Dragon armor.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Dragon Armor
'''Scales'''
* [[File:HTTYD Nadder scale.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Deadly Nadder Scale
** Used to craft Deadly Nadder Rider Armor.
* [[File:HTTYD Gronckle scale.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Gronckle Scale
** Used to craft Gronckle Rider Armor.
* [[File:HTTYD Zippleback scale.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Hideous Zippleback Scale
** Used to craft Hideous Zippleback Rider Armor.
* [[File:HTTYD Nightmare scale.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Monstrous Nightmare Scale
** Used to craft Monstrous Nightmare Rider Armor.
* [[File:HTTYD Nightfury scale.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Toothless Scale
** Used to Toothless Rider Armor.
'''[[Spawn egg]]s'''
* [[File:HTTYD Egg Nadder.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Deadly Nadder Egg
* [[File:HTTYD Egg Gronckle.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Gronckle Egg
* [[File:HTTYD Egg Nightfury.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Toothless Egg
* [[File:HTTYD Egg Nightmare.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Monstrous Nightmare Egg
* [[File:HTTYD Egg Zippleback.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Hideous Zippleback Egg

=== Blocks ===
* [[File:HTTYD Forge.png|32px]] Forge
** Used to craft the new types of dragon armor
** Emits a [[light]] level of three

=== Entities ===
'''{{visible anchor|Dragons}}'''
* [[File:HTTYD Deadly Nadder.png|64px]] Deadly Nadder
* [[File:HTTYD Gronckle.png|64px]] Gronckle
* [[File:HTTYD Hideous Zippleback.png|64px]] Hideous Zippleback
* [[File:HTTYD Monstrous Nightmare.png|64px]] Monstrous Nightmare
* [[File:HTTYD Night Fury.png|64px]] Toothless
'''Projectiles'''
* [[File:HTTYD Quill (projectile).png|32px]] Quill
** Thrown by the Deadly Nadder
* [[File:HTTYD Plasma (projectile).png|32px]] Plasma
** Thrown by Toothless.
* [[File:HTTYD Magma (projectile).png|32px]] Magma
** Thrown by the Gronckle

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Discover Toothless and other beloved dragons in your Minecraft Worlds! Become a dragon rider with this Add-On based on Universal Pictures’ live-action reimagining of DreamWorks Animation’s How to Train Your Dragon.<br>Take off into the skies, learn each dragon's personality, and bond with them to unlock unique abilities. Embark on an iconic adventure with your new dragon!|Minecraft Marketplace description}}
